title: EMV Connection - A Secure Technology Alliance Site
text: EMV chip payments are here in the US! Consumers are now using secure EMV chip cards to pay nationwide. Chip payments reduce counterfeit card fraud, enable global interoperability, and prepare for NFC mobile contactless payments. EMV Connection provides up-to-date information and educational resources from the U.S. Payments Forum and Secure Technology Alliance to assist all industry stakeholders with EMV migration.
